name: Tile Ruler
description:
Tile Ruler is a puzzle platformer with new kind of twist! You will have to select blocks/items and use them to beat different levels. But you can't take all these items with you, there is a limit. Taking less and less items will guarantee better score, and make levels more puzzling. So are you ready to use a selective mind and platformer skills to complete the story?

There are 30 levels with different solutions, as a goal to reach the exit sign. The levels will get harder, and player will be presented new content in his adventure. Using simple platformer as a platform, these levels aren't too easy for any kind of adventurer.

Properties:
- Level can be viewed and certain amount of tiles/blocks/items can be selected before level starts.
- Tiles can be placed near player, and tiles can be blocks, usable and passive items.
- The game is progressive, and new content is presented when game progresses.
- The goal is to reach exit sign with possible requirements.
- If you get stuck, use walkthrough in the game menu under 'Help'.
- Mouse and keyboard.
- Singleplayer.

Known Issues:
- Supports only 16:9 Screen Resolution and it will be always set.
